title: News24.com | WATCH: Ex-drug addict finds purpose in working with animals
text:
WATCH: Ex-drug addict finds purpose in working with animals 15 February, 01:30 PM 
The Soweto Animal Rescue and Advisory Centre is not only a safe haven for abandoned and abused animals, but it opens its doors to people with a story to tell. 
For staff members, affectionately known as “Jerry’s Rangers”, the centre is a haven that has helped them through dark times. 
Ex-drug addict Thabang Baloyi says working with animals at SARAC has not only has rescued him, but has shaped his life for the better. Sha
